___dnsServers.description: Dns servers to be used by this VNET. This should be a comma-separated list of IP addresses.

A certificate file (.cer) blob containing the public key of the private key used to authenticate a 
            Point-To-Site VPN connection.

$eref.description: Microsoft.Web/sites/slots/virtualNetworkConnections/gateways

___hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: Specification for the hosting environment (App Service Environment) to use for the web app

___hostNameSslStates.description: Hostname SSL states are  used to manage the SSL bindings for site's hostnames.

___enabled.description: True if the site is enabled; otherwise, false. Setting this  value to false disables the site (takes the site off line).

___scmSiteAlsoStopped.description: If set indicates whether to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the web app is stopped. Default is false.

___hostNamesDisabled.description:
Specifies if the public hostnames are disabled the web app.
            If set to true the app is only accessible via API Management process

___cloningInfo.description:
This is only valid for web app creation. If specified, web app is cloned from 
            a source web app

___gatewaySiteName.description: Name of gateway app associated with web app

___clientCertEnabled.description: Specifies if the client certificate is enabled for the web app

___clientAffinityEnabled.description: Specifies if the client affinity is enabled when load balancing http request for multiple instances of the web app

___maxNumberOfWorkers.description:
Maximum number of workers
            This only applies to function container

Microsoft.Web/sites/slots/deployments
Microsoft.Web/sites/slots/virtualNetworkConnections

___dnsServers.description: Dns servers to be used by this VNET. This should be a comma-separated list of IP addresses.

___certBlob.description:
A certificate file (.cer) blob containing the public key of the private key used to authenticate a 
            Point-To-Site VPN connection.

___routes.description: The routes that this virtual network connection uses.

___resyncRequired.description: Flag to determine if a resync is required

$eref.description: Microsoft.Web/sites/virtualNetworkConnections/gateways

___name.description: The name of this route. This is only returned by the server and does not need to be set by the client.

___endAddress.description: The ending address for this route. If the start address is specified in CIDR notation, this must be omitted.

___startAddress.description: The starting address for this route. This may also include a CIDR notation, in which case the end address must not be specified.

___routeType.description:
The type of route this is:
            DEFAULT - By default, every web app has routes to the local address ranges specified by RFC1918
            INHERITED - Routes inherited from the real Virtual Network routes
            STATIC - Static route set on the web app only
            
            These values will be used for syncing a Web App's routes with those from a Virtual Network. This operation will clear all DEFAULT and INHERITED routes and replace them
            with new INHERITED routes.

___allowedMultiSizes.description: List of comma separated strings describing which VM sizes are allowed for front-ends

___status.description: Current status of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment).

___apiManagementAccountId.description: Api Management Account associated with this Hosting Environment

___maximumNumberOfMachines.description: Maximum number of VMs in this hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___virtualNetwork.description: Description of the hostingEnvironment's (App Service Environment) virtual network

___vipMappings.description: Description of IP SSL mapping for this hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___clusterSettings.description: Custom settings for changing the behavior of the hosting environment

___lastAction.description: Last deployment action on this hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___workerPools.description: Description of worker pools with worker size ids, VM sizes, and number of workers in each pool

___allowedWorkerSizes.description: List of comma separated strings describing which VM sizes are allowed for workers

___dnsSuffix.description: DNS suffix of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___vnetName.description: Name of the hostingEnvironment's (App Service Environment) virtual network

___upgradeDomains.description: Number of upgrade domains of this hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___lastActionResult.description: Result of the last deployment action on this hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___environmentCapacities.description: Current total, used, and available worker capacities

___environmentIsHealthy.description: True/false indicating whether the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) is healthy

___networkAccessControlList.description: Access control list for controlling traffic to the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___resourceGroup.description: Resource group of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___location.description: Location of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment), e.g. "West US"

___ipsslAddressCount.description: Number of IP SSL addresses reserved for this hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___vnetSubnetName.description: Subnet of the hostingEnvironment's (App Service Environment) virtual network

___vnetResourceGroupName.description: Resource group of the hostingEnvironment's (App Service Environment) virtual network

___subscriptionId.description: Subscription of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___environmentStatus.description: Detailed message about with results of the last check of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___name.description: Name of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___internalLoadBalancingMode.description: Specifies which endpoints to serve internally in the hostingEnvironment's (App Service Environment) VNET.

___suspended.description:
True/false indicating whether the hostingEnvironment is suspended. The environment can be suspended e.g. when the management endpoint is no longer available
            (most likely because NSG blocked the incoming traffic)

___provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment).

___databaseServiceObjective.description: Service objective of the metadata database for the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) e.g. "S0"

_88CloningInfo.description: Represents information needed for cloning operation

___configureLoadBalancing.description: If specified configure load balancing for source and clone site

___trafficManagerProfileName.description: Name of traffic manager profile to create. This is only needed if traffic manager profile does not already exist

___sourceWebAppId.description:
ARM resource id of the source web app. Web app resource id is of the form 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName} for production slots and 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName}/slots/{slotName} for other slots

___cloneSourceControl.description: Clone source control from source web app

___cloneCustomHostNames.description: If true, clone custom hostnames from source web app

___appSettingsOverrides.description:
Application settings overrides for cloned web app. If specified these settings will override the settings cloned 
            from source web app. If not specified, application settings from source web app are retained.

___trafficManagerProfileId.description:
ARM resource id of the traffic manager profile to use if it exists. Traffic manager resource id is of the form 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/trafficManagerProfiles/{profileName}

___correlationId.description:
Correlation Id of cloning operation. This id ties multiple cloning operations
            together to use the same snapshot

_88VnetRoute.description: VnetRoute contract used to pass routing information for a vnet.

___name.description: The name of this route. This is only returned by the server and does not need to be set by the client.

___endAddress.description: The ending address for this route. If the start address is specified in CIDR notation, this must be omitted.

___startAddress.description: The starting address for this route. This may also include a CIDR notation, in which case the end address must not be specified.

___routeType.description:
The type of route this is:
            DEFAULT - By default, every web app has routes to the local address ranges specified by RFC1918
            INHERITED - Routes inherited from the real Virtual Network routes
            STATIC - Static route set on the web app only
            
            These values will be used for syncing a Web App's routes with those from a Virtual Network. This operation will clear all DEFAULT and INHERITED routes and replace them
            with new INHERITED routes.

_88RampUpRule.description: Routing rules for ramp up testing. This rule allows to redirect static traffic % to a slot or to gradually change routing % based on performance

___name.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

___changeDecisionCallbackUrl.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which Url can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
            https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

___changeIntervalInMinutes.description: [Optional] Specifies interval in mimuntes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage

___minReroutePercentage.description: [Optional] Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

___reroutePercentage.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to {Microsoft.Web.Hosting.Administration.RampUpRule.ActionHostName}

___actionHostName.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. mysite-stage.azurewebsites.net

___maxReroutePercentage.description: [Optional] Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

_88VirtualNetworkProfile.description: Specification for using a virtual network

___type.description: Resource type of the virtual network (read-only)

___id.description: Resource id of the virtual network

___location.description: Geo region resource belongs to e.g. SouthCentralUS, SouthEastAsia

___subnetMask.description: Subnet mask for the range of IP addresses the restriction is valid for

___ipAddress.description: IP address the security restriction is valid for

$eref.description: Represents database connection string information
Name value pair

The IIS handler mappings used to define which handler processes HTTP requests with certain extension. 
            For example it is used to configure php-cgi.exe process to handle all HTTP requests with *.php extension.

___scriptProcessor.description: The absolute path to the FastCGI application.

___extension.description: Requests with this extension will be handled using the specified FastCGI application.

___arguments.description: Command-line arguments to be passed to the script processor.

$eref.description: Represents metric limits set on a web app.

___maxMemoryInMb.description: Maximum allowed memory usage in MB

___maxDiskSizeInMb.description: Maximum allowed disk size usage in MB

___domainId.description: Fully qualified ARM domain resource URI

_88SiteLimits.description: Represents metric limits set on a web app.

___maxMemoryInMb.description: Maximum allowed memory usage in MB

___maxDiskSizeInMb.description: Maximum allowed disk size usage in MB

_88WorkerPool.description: Worker pool of a hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___computeMode.description: Shared or dedicated web app hosting.

___instanceNames.description: Names of all instances in the worker pool (read only)

___workerCount.description: Number of instances in the worker pool

___workerSizeId.description: Worker size id for referencing this worker pool

___workerSize.description: VM size of the worker pool instances

$eref.description: Describes a sku for a scalable resource

___capacity.description: Current number of instances assigned to the resource

___size.description: Size specifier of the resource sku

___tier.description: Service Tier of the resource sku

___family.description: Family code of the resource sku

___dnsServers.description: Dns servers to be used by this VNET. This should be a comma-separated list of IP addresses.

___certBlob.description:
A certificate file (.cer) blob containing the public key of the private key used to authenticate a 
            Point-To-Site VPN connection.

___routes.description: The routes that this virtual network connection uses.

___resyncRequired.description: Flag to determine if a resync is required

$eref.description: Microsoft.Web/sites/virtualNetworkConnections/gateways

___computeMode.description: Shared or dedicated web app hosting.

___instanceNames.description: Names of all instances in the worker pool (read only)

___workerCount.description: Number of instances in the worker pool

___workerSizeId.description: Worker size id for referencing this worker pool

___workerSize.description: VM size of the worker pool instances

$eref.description: Describes a sku for a scalable resource

___capacity.description: Current number of instances assigned to the resource

___size.description: Size specifier of the resource sku

___tier.description: Service Tier of the resource sku

___family.description: Family code of the resource sku

_88AutoHealCustomAction.description:
AutoHealCustomAction - Describes the custom action to be executed
            when an auto heal rule is triggered.

___vpnPackageUri.description: The URI where the Vpn package can be downloaded

_88ApiDefinitionInfo.description: Information about the formal API definition for the web app.

___url.description: The URL of the API definition.

_88VirtualIPMapping.description: Class that represents a VIP mapping

_88SkuDescription.description: Describes a sku for a scalable resource

___capacity.description: Current number of instances assigned to the resource

___size.description: Size specifier of the resource sku

___tier.description: Service Tier of the resource sku

___family.description: Family code of the resource sku

___isApplicableForAllComputeModes.description: Is capacity applicable for all sites?

___excludeFromCapacityAllocation.description:
If true it includes basic sites
            Basic sites are not used for capacity allocation.

___availableCapacity.description: Available capacity (# of machines, bytes of storage etc...)

___totalCapacity.description: Total capacity (# of machines, bytes of storage etc...)

___workerSizeId.description:
Size Id of machines: 
            0 - Small
            1 - Medium
            2 - Large

_88AutoHealActions.description:
AutoHealActions - Describes the actions which can be
            taken by the auto-heal module when a rule is triggered.

___actionType.description: ActionType - predefined action to be taken.

$eref.description:
AutoHealCustomAction - Describes the custom action to be executed
            when an auto heal rule is triggered.

___customAction.description: CustomAction - custom action to be taken

___minProcessExecutionTime.description:
MinProcessExecutionTime - minimum time the process must execute
            before taking the action

_88Experiments.description: Class containing Routing in production experiments

$eref.description: Routing rules for ramp up testing. This rule allows to redirect static traffic % to a slot or to gradually change routing % based on performance

___name.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

___changeDecisionCallbackUrl.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which Url can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
            https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

___changeIntervalInMinutes.description: [Optional] Specifies interval in mimuntes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage

___minReroutePercentage.description: [Optional] Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

___reroutePercentage.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to {Microsoft.Web.Hosting.Administration.RampUpRule.ActionHostName}

___actionHostName.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. mysite-stage.azurewebsites.net

___maxReroutePercentage.description: [Optional] Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

___vpnPackageUri.description: The URI where the Vpn package can be downloaded

$eref.description: Specification for a hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) to use for this resource

___name.description: Name of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) (read only)

___type.description: Resource type of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) (read only)

___id.description: Resource id of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

___hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: Specification for the hosting environment (App Service Environment) to use for the web app

$eref.description: Object that represents a SSL-enabled host name.

___toUpdate.description: Set this flag to update existing host name

___virtualIP.description: Virtual IP address assigned to the host name if IP based SSL is enabled

___hostNameSslStates.description: Hostname SSL states are  used to manage the SSL bindings for site's hostnames.

___enabled.description: True if the site is enabled; otherwise, false. Setting this  value to false disables the site (takes the site off line).

___scmSiteAlsoStopped.description: If set indicates whether to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the web app is stopped. Default is false.

___hostNamesDisabled.description:
Specifies if the public hostnames are disabled the web app.
            If set to true the app is only accessible via API Management process

$eref.description: Represents information needed for cloning operation

___configureLoadBalancing.description: If specified configure load balancing for source and clone site

___trafficManagerProfileName.description: Name of traffic manager profile to create. This is only needed if traffic manager profile does not already exist

___sourceWebAppId.description:
ARM resource id of the source web app. Web app resource id is of the form 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName} for production slots and 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName}/slots/{slotName} for other slots

___cloneSourceControl.description: Clone source control from source web app

___cloneCustomHostNames.description: If true, clone custom hostnames from source web app

___appSettingsOverrides.description:
Application settings overrides for cloned web app. If specified these settings will override the settings cloned 
            from source web app. If not specified, application settings from source web app are retained.

___trafficManagerProfileId.description:
ARM resource id of the traffic manager profile to use if it exists. Traffic manager resource id is of the form 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/trafficManagerProfiles/{profileName}

___correlationId.description:
Correlation Id of cloning operation. This id ties multiple cloning operations
            together to use the same snapshot

___cloningInfo.description:
This is only valid for web app creation. If specified, web app is cloned from 
            a source web app

___gatewaySiteName.description: Name of gateway app associated with web app

$eref.description: Configuration of Azure web site

___clientCertEnabled.description: Specifies if the client certificate is enabled for the web app

___clientAffinityEnabled.description: Specifies if the client affinity is enabled when load balancing http request for multiple instances of the web app

___maxNumberOfWorkers.description:
Maximum number of workers
            This only applies to function container

___domainId.description: Fully qualified ARM domain resource URI
